include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (LIBCURL_ARCHIVE "${LIBCURL_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/lib/.libs/libcurl.a")

register_external_lib (libcurl ${LIBCURL_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${LIBCURL_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${LIBCURL_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LIBCURL")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${LIBCURL_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include -D_BUILT_IN_LIBCURL")
